commandPalette.placeholder: Search packages, casks, repositories, or navigate to views...

footers.installedFormulas: These formulae are already installed on your system.
footers.installedCasks: These casks (GUI applications) are already installed on your system.
footers.allFormulas: All available Homebrew formulae. Green highlighting shows installed formulae.
footers.allCasks: All available Homebrew casks (GUI applications, fonts, plugins). Green highlighting shows installed casks.
footers.leaves: Leaves are formulae that are not required as dependencies by other installed formulae.
footers.repositories: Repositories (Taps) are sources for formulae. These contain additional packages besides the standard repository.
footers.homebrew: Manage and update Homebrew itself. Check the installed version and update Homebrew core when a newer version is available.
footers.doctor: Doctor is a Homebrew feature that can detect the most common causes of errors.
footers.cleanup: Cleanup removes outdated downloads and cached files to free up disk space.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: WailBrew ‚Äì Minimalist Homebrew GUI for macOS
about.description: WailBrew is a modern graphical user interface for Homebrew that makes it easy to manage, install and update packages.
about.acknowledgmentText: Inspired by {{cakebrew}} by Bruno Philipe.\nThanks for the great work on the original Homebrew GUI!
about.translationThanks: A huge thank you to everyone who contributed translations!
about.copyright: Copyright ¬© 2025 Nico Wickersheim. All rights reserved.

help.title: Help
help.helpMessage: Currently there is no help page available.

updateDialog.title: Check for Updates
updateDialog.availableViaHomebrew: A new version is available via Homebrew Cask
updateDialog.instruction: To update WailBrew, please run the following commands in your terminal:
updateDialog.currentVersionIs: Version {{version}} is the current version available via Homebrew.
updateDialog.restartMessage: The update has been successfully installed. Please restart WailBrew to use the new version.

restartDialog.title: Restart Required
restartDialog.description: WailBrew was successfully updated. Please restart the application to use the new version.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your Homebrew experience
settings.footer: Configure WailBrew settings to customize your Homebrew experience.

brewPath.title: Homebrew Path Configuration
brewPath.description: Specify the path to your Homebrew installation. WailBrew will use this path to execute all Homebrew commands.
brewPath.note: Note: Changing the brew path will refresh all package data to reflect the new Homebrew installation.

messages.mirrorSourceReset: Mirror source reset to current value.
messages.outdatedFlagReset: Outdated flag reset to current value.
messages.caskAppDirUpdated: Cask app directory setting updated successfully!
messages.caskAppDirReset: Cask app directory reset to current value.

errors.failedToGetPath: Failed to get current brew path.
errors.emptyPath: Please enter a valid brew path.
errors.invalidPath: Invalid brew path. Please check that the path exists and is a valid brew executable.
errors.autoDetectionFailed: Could not auto-detect brew path. Please enter the path manually.
errors.failedToSetMirrorSource: Failed to set mirror source. Please check your configuration.
errors.failedToSetOutdatedFlag: Failed to set outdated flag. Please check your configuration.
errors.failedToSetCaskAppDir: Failed to set cask app directory. Please check your configuration.
errors.failedToSetCustomCaskOpts: Failed to set custom cask options. Please check your input.
errors.failedToSetCustomOutdatedArgs: Failed to set custom outdated arguments. Please check your input.

mirrorSource.title: Homebrew Mirror Source
mirrorSource.description: Switch Homebrew mirror sources to improve download speeds in regions with network issues. This configures HOMEBREW_GIT_REMOTE and HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN environment variables.
mirrorSource.note: Note: Changing the mirror source will affect all Homebrew operations. Restart the app or refresh packages after changing.

outdatedFlag.title: Outdated Packages Detection
outdatedFlag.description: Configure how WailBrew detects outdated packages. This setting controls which flags are used with the 'brew outdated' command.
outdatedFlag.note: Note: Changing this setting will refresh the outdated packages list to reflect the new detection mode.

descriptions.none: Shows only packages that have newer versions available. This is the default Homebrew behavior.
descriptions.greedy: Also includes casks that have a version available but are marked as auto-updating. Useful for seeing all available updates.
descriptions.greedyAutoUpdates: Includes auto-updating casks that can actually be upgraded. This is the most comprehensive detection mode.

caskAppDir.title: Cask Application Directory
caskAppDir.description: Configure the directory where Homebrew Cask applications are installed. This sets the HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS environment variable with --appdir option.
caskAppDir.hint: Click the folder icon to select a directory. Leave empty to use the default /Applications directory.
caskAppDir.note: Note: Changing this setting will affect where new cask installations and upgrades are placed. Existing installations are not moved automatically.

adminUsername.title: Admin Username
adminUsername.description: Specify an alternative admin account for privileged operations
adminUsername.label: Admin Username
adminUsername.info: This username will be used when Homebrew operations require administrator privileges. Leave empty to use your current user account.

advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.subtitle: For advanced users
advancedOptions.description: Configure additional Homebrew command options directly. These settings allow you to pass custom arguments and options to Homebrew commands.
advancedOptions.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Advanced users only: Incorrect options may cause Homebrew commands to fail. Consult Homebrew documentation for valid options.

customCaskOpts.label: Custom Cask Options
customCaskOpts.hint: Additional HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS flags. Example: --fontdir, --qlplugindir, --prefpanedir. These will be merged with the UI-configured --appdir setting above.

customOutdatedArgs.label: Custom Outdated Arguments
customOutdatedArgs.hint: Additional arguments for 'brew outdated' command. Example: --verbose, --formula, --cask. These will be appended to the UI-configured outdated flag above.

update.retryingWithForce: üîÑ Retrying update for '{{name}}' with --force (app may be in use)...

updateAll.success: ‚úÖ Update for all packages completed successfully!
